fields.name: Name
fields.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

fields.name: Product
fields.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

fields.name: PromotionCode
fields.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

fields.name: Publisher
fields.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

fields.name: Version
fields.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.
